title: Rajasi Ruby & Diamond Lakshmi Haaram - A Timeless Heirloom
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.

The five-strand Ruby bead arrangement is accented by pearls throughout the piece.
